desc: Full color home decor arrangements that last months and years not weeks. My genuine preserved flowers and foliage are the same types of flowers you'd find at a fresh florist. Based in Memphis TN I preserve and design bouquets, wreaths and home centerpieces. I bring smiles and lift moods in a challenging year. Stay safe

layout.text:
Deliver a smile or style your home.
The Preserved Florist's specialty flowers last between 1 and 3 years.
The Ultimate Romantic Gift!
